title: Desperado Esports Insight Application Form

embed.description: This form is to apply for the tryouts for desperado e sport

body:
Desperado Esports
Basic Information:
Hello all competitive League of Legends players. We are Desperado Esports, and our Organization is looking for all types of individuals in the league community that are looking to expand their personal talents to join a serious organization. We are an expanding organization looking to recruit new individuals for a current roster spot opening. Our current vision of Desperado Esports is to become more competitive in all aspects of organizations including competing at a high (intense) level, practicing constantly, and participating in scrims and tournaments. This is not the limit of our goals but the general intent. Individuals who have talents in the above mentioned fields are welcome to apply especially those whom have experience in multiple categories.

What to expect from Desperado Esports:
Opportunities
Stable environment
Honesty
Transparency
Regular communication
Irreplaceable Staff
A+ Attitude
Leadership

What Desperado Esports expects from you:
Interaction
Dedication
Loyalty
Effort
Growth
Willingness to work with others
Ability to take criticism
Reliability
Ability to maintain set scheduling
A+ Attitude

Why choose us:
There are many great groups of gamers in league of legends, and they are all wonderful, and I would never discredit them, however most groups out in league vary between either dead serious groups or groups where there is no pressure for ranked. Most recruitment threads are for just a team, only a select few are for a community or simply any group larger than 7 players/coaches.
We pride ourselves as being the right blend of everything a dedicated player needs. 
While we do not put players on our roster if they have no desire to play scrims, we are always willing to support any player dedicated to their own growth.
Simply said, if you are dedicated to league, we will find a spot for you or make a spot for you if it is in our power. We also talk to each of our members, staff and player to ensure that there are no issues socially, as well as that they feel like they are improving. When they feel as if they have not been, we figure out why. 
As a growing organization Desperado Esports is proud and dedicated to giving our best to everyone. And we expect the same from our members; Passion for the dream that is League of Legends and Competition to be the best you can be.

To Apply:
Please click the linka bove and fill out our application form 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ETOLWgvPmiQ5r9ElmxVWyQcl-PmY502TlJ1nBqcZwnU
